EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing Pivotal Support Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are pleased to introduce the Pivotal Support Update <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/218808208#customerportal]]>—a regular digest that curates the most relevant Pivotal knowledge, product updates, maintenance releases, support services, and more, for you.
Experience the New Pivotal Customer Portal Many of you have seen the news on our Pivotal Customer Portal. The new portal is a central point of access for all of the information and services you require to assist you in your engagement with Pivotal, through a single, unified support experience. Read more about it here <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/218808208#customerportal]]>.
Top Knowledge Base Articles We constantly strive to provide the best content for self-service, and this month, we showcase the top articles that everyone should know. Click here <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/218808208#topten]]> to find out more about our Knowledge Base articles.
Product Updates Find out the latest on New Releases, Maintenance Releases, Security Releases, and Upcoming Support Availability in our Product Updates <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/218808208#updates]]>!
There’s more...You can find information on Pivotal Academy training, Global Support Social Offerings, and glimpses of the Ireland Support team in a brand new video <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/218808208#gsscork]]>.
Head to the new Pivotal Support Update <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/218808208#top]]> for all of this and more..
